name: Dodle Hoop
description:
Dodle Hoop

Doodle Hoop (or DodleHoop due to early spelling errors) is a game made in 8 hours for the One Click Jam in Córdoba - Argentina.

It's made with the Blender Game Engine, and other open source software like LMMS, Krita, Audacity, etc.

Made by:

  • General Assistance: Mayco Molina
  • Music: Rodrigo Pizarro
  • Programmer: Mateo de Mayo
  • Sprites: Renzo Sartore
